description: Mobile Developer is the sole resource for critical native features (Auth, Location, Sync).
mitigation_strategy: Establish strict API contracts early so Backend team can mock all mobile endpoints. Defer non-essential UI polish.

description: DevOps utilization is <25% while Mobile is >85%.
mitigation_strategy: Assign DevOps Lead to handle all CI/CD for mobile, including App Center setup and build scripts, relieving Mobile Dev of operational tasks.
